branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1B-*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/, w/o Stroke Adjuster - Basic Type
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless Cylinders, MY1B-*Z have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile.  End of stroke adjusters are available with these series.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Basic Type
Rodless Cylinder, MY1B-*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/, w/o Stroke Adjuster - Basic Type

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1B-A*Z, Mechanically Jointed, w/Stroke Adjuster - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>The MY1B-A*Z Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. Air cushions are standard adjustable with an easy access cushion needle, and external shock absorbers are optional. Auto-switch mounting has been enhanced with a face mounting feature.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1B-S*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/o Stroke Adjuster - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>The MY1B-S*Z Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. Air cushions are standard adjustable with an easy access cushion needle. Auto-switch mounting has been enhanced with a face mounting feature.</p>
